name: Epic Browser
description: Privacy-focused web browser with built-in VPN and tracker blocking

opengraph.title: Epic Privacy Browser
opengraph.description: Epic is a private, secure web browser that blocks ads, trackers, fingerprinting, cryptomining, ultrasound signaling and more.
opengraph.twitter_description: Epic is a private, secure web browser that blocks ads, trackers, fingerprinting, cryptomining, ultrasound signaling and more.
